means: 二原子的，二氢氧基的，二价的

sentence.Network_en: We have concentrated on the ground electronic states of diatomic molecules.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们曾主要集中注意双原子分子的电子基态.

sentence.Network_en: Apart from selenium and vapour - deposited germanium and silicon, glasses are at least diatomic.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了硒和汽相沉积的锗和硅之外, 玻璃至少是二原子的.

sentence.Network_en: Any heteronuclear diatomic molecule must have a dipole moment since its two ends are different.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何异核双原子分子必然具有偶极矩,因为它的两端是不同的.
